sqlMap.statement: SELECT IV.IMPT_INV_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_PK ,IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_VND_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VESL_NM ,IV.IMPT_INV_FLGT_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_BOL_NUM ,IV.IMPT_VND_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_CARR_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_SHPG_METH_CD ,ID.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,ID.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_CSE_CLS_CD ,PS.OUT_PACK_FROM_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_TO_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.DEF_INVTY_LOC_CD ,PSD.IN_PACK_WH_IN_ETA_DT ,PSD.IN_PACK_NET_WT ,PSD.MDSE_CD ,PSD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK ,PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK ,PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK ,PSD.IN_PACK_TOT_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_UNIT_QTY ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,VD.VND_CD ,SUBSTR(PVV.PRNT_VND_NM , 0 , 60) AS LOC_NM ,VD.ADDL_LOC_NM ,VD.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,VD.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,VD.CTY_ADDR ,VD.ST_CD ,VD.POST_CD ,VD.CTRY_CD ,VD.TEL_NUM FROM IMPT_INV IV ,IMPT_INV_DO ID ,IMPT_PACK_SLP PS ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL PSD ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS PSS ,VND VD ,PO_VND_V PVV WHERE IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IV.IMPT_INV_PK = #imptInvPk# AND IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD = #imptInvClsCd# AND IV.IMPT_INV_PRT_FLG = #imptInvPrtFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_ACTV_VRSN_FLG = #imptInvActvVrsnFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD = #imptInvSlpClsCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IV.IMPT_INV_PK = PSS.IMPT_INV_PK AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_CD = #imptPackSlpStsCd# AND PSS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ID.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSS.IMPT_INV_DO_PK = ID.IMPT_INV_DO_PK AND ID.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK = PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK AND PS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK = PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK AND PSD.IN_PACK_TOT_QTY > #inPackTotQty# AND PSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND IV.IMPT_VND_CD = VD.VND_CD(+) AND VD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VD.VND_CD = PVV.VND_CD(+) AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY PSD.DEF_INVTY_LOC_CD ASC ,PSD.MDSE_CD ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ASC

SELECT PS.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,PS.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_CSE_CLS_CD ,PS.OUT_PACK_FROM_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_TO_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.DEF_INVTY_LOC_CD ,PSD.IN_PACK_WH_IN_ETA_DT ,PSD.IN_PACK_NET_WT ,PSD.MDSE_CD ,PSD.IMPT_INV_PK ,PSD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK ,PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK ,PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK ,PSD.IN_PACK_TOT_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_UNIT_QTY ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,IV.IMPT_VND_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VESL_NM ,IV.IMPT_INV_FLGT_NUM ,IV.IMPT_VND_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_CARR_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,ID.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,ID.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,CT.IMPT_CNTNR_SEAL_NUM_01 ,VD.VND_CD ,SUBSTR(PVV.PRNT_VND_NM , 0 ,60) AS LOC_NM ,VD.ADDL_LOC_NM ,VD.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,VD.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,VD.CTY_ADDR ,VD.ST_CD ,VD.POST_CD ,VD.CTRY_CD ,VD.TEL_NUM FROM IMPT_PACK_SLP PS ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL PSD ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS PSS ,IMPT_INV IV ,IMPT_INV_DO ID ,IMPT_CNTNR CT ,VND VD ,PO_VND_V PVV WHERE CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CT.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM = #imptCntnrLotNum# AND CT.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM = #imptCntnrNum# AND CT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CT.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM = PS.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM AND CT.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM = PS.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM AND PS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK = PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_CD = #imptPackSlpStsCd# AND PSS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK = PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK AND PSD.IN_PACK_TOT_QTY > #inPackTotQty# AND PSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSS.IMPT_INV_PK = IV.IMPT_INV_PK AND IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD = #imptInvClsCd# AND IV.IMPT_INV_PRT_FLG = #imptInvPrtFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_ACTV_VRSN_FLG = #imptInvActvVrsnFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD = #imptInvSlpClsCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ID.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSS.IMPT_INV_DO_PK = ID.IMPT_INV_DO_PK AND ID.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND IV.IMPT_VND_CD = VD.VND_CD(+) AND VD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VD.VND_CD = PVV.VND_CD(+) AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY PSD.DEF_INVTY_LOC_CD ASC ,PSD.MDSE_CD ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ASC

SELECT LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK ,LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_WH_CD ,LSOD.REQ_WH_ETA_DT ,LSOD.INLND_SHPG_METH_CD ,LSOD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_QTY ,LSOH.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM ,LSOH.INLND_CARR_CD ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_CSE_CLS_CD ,PS.OUT_PACK_FROM_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_TO_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_NET_WT ,PSD.MDSE_CD ,PSD.IN_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_UNIT_QTY ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,IV.IMPT_INV_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_VND_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VESL_NM ,IV.IMPT_INV_FLGT_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_BOL_NUM ,IV.IMPT_VND_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_SHPG_METH_CD ,ID.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,ID.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,VD.VND_CD ,SUBSTR(PVV.PRNT_VND_NM , 0 , 60) AS LOC_NM ,VD.ADDL_LOC_NM ,VD.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,VD.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,VD.CTY_ADDR ,VD.ST_CD ,VD.POST_CD ,VD.CTRY_CD ,VD.TEL_NUM FROM LGSC_SCP_ORD_DTL LSOD ,LGSC_SCP_ORD_HDR LSOH ,IMPT_PACK_SLP PS ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL PSD ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS PSS ,IMPT_INV IV ,IMPT_INV_DO ID ,VND VD ,PO_VND_V PVV WHERE LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK = #imptInvPk# AND LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_QTY > #reqStkInQty# AND LSOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LSOH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM = LSOH.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM AND LSOH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK = PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK AND PS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK = PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK AND PSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK = PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_CD = #imptPackSlpStsCd# AND PSS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK = IV.IMPT_INV_PK AND IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD = #imptInvClsCd# AND IV.IMPT_INV_PRT_FLG = #imptInvPrtFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_ACTV_VRSN_FLG = #imptInvActvVrsnFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD = #imptInvSlpClsCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ID.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK = ID.IMPT_INV_DO_PK AND ID.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND IV.IMPT_VND_CD = VD.VND_CD(+) AND VD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VD.VND_CD = PVV.VND_CD(+) AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_WH_CD ASC ,PSD.MDSE_CD ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ASC

SELECT LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_WH_CD ,LSOD.REQ_WH_ETA_DT ,LSOD.INLND_SHPG_METH_CD ,LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_QTY ,LSOD.REQ_WH_ETA_DT ,LSOH.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM ,LSOH.INLND_CARR_CD ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_CSE_CLS_CD ,PS.OUT_PACK_FROM_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_TO_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_NET_WT ,PSD.MDSE_CD ,PSD.IN_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_UNIT_QTY ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,IV.IMPT_VND_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VESL_NM ,IV.IMPT_INV_FLGT_NUM ,IV.IMPT_VND_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,ID.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,ID.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,VD.VND_CD ,SUBSTR(PVV.PRNT_VND_NM , 0 , 60) AS LOC_NM ,VD.ADDL_LOC_NM ,VD.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,VD.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,VD.CTY_ADDR ,VD.ST_CD ,VD.POST_CD ,VD.CTRY_CD ,VD.TEL_NUM ,CT.IMPT_CNTNR_SEAL_NUM_01 FROM LGSC_SCP_ORD_DTL LSOD ,LGSC_SCP_ORD_HDR LSOH ,IMPT_PACK_SLP PS ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL PSD ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS PSS ,IMPT_INV IV ,IMPT_INV_DO ID ,VND VD ,IMPT_CNTNR CT ,PO_VND_V PVV WHERE LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM = #imptCntnrLotNum# AND LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM = #imptCntnrNum# AND LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_QTY > #reqStkInQty# AND LSOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM = CT.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM AND LSOD.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM = CT.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM AND CT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LSOH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM = LSOH.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM AND LSOH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK = PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK AND PS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK = PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK AND PSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK = PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK AND PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_CD = #imptPackSlpStsCd# AND PSS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK = IV.IMPT_INV_PK AND IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD = #imptInvClsCd# AND IV.IMPT_INV_PRT_FLG = #imptInvPrtFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_ACTV_VRSN_FLG = #imptInvActvVrsnFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD = #imptInvSlpClsCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ID.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK = ID.IMPT_INV_DO_PK AND ID.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND IV.IMPT_VND_CD = VD.VND_CD(+) AND VD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VD.VND_CD = PVV.VND_CD(+) AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY LSOD.REQ_STK_IN_WH_CD ASC ,PSD.MDSE_CD ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ASC

SELECT TCT.SCP_CNTNR_NUM ,TCT.SCP_SEAL_NUM ,TCT.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK ,TCT.ASN_NUM ,TCT.INLND_SHPG_METH_CD ,SM.STK_IN_WH_CD ,SM.WH_ETA_DT ,LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK ,LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,LSOD.ASN_STK_IN_QTY ,LSOH.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM ,LSOH.INLND_CARR_CD ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,PS.IMPT_PACK_CSE_CLS_CD ,PS.OUT_PACK_FROM_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_TO_CSE_NUM ,PS.OUT_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_NET_WT ,PSD.MDSE_CD ,PSD.IN_PACK_CSE_QTY ,PSD.IN_PACK_UNIT_QTY ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,IV.IMPT_VND_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VESL_NM ,IV.IMPT_INV_FLGT_NUM ,IV.IMPT_VND_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,ID.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,ID.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,VD.VND_CD ,SUBSTR(PVV.PRNT_VND_NM , 0 , 60) AS LOC_NM ,VD.ADDL_LOC_NM ,VD.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,VD.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,VD.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,VD.CTY_ADDR ,VD.ST_CD ,VD.POST_CD ,VD.CTRY_CD ,VD.TEL_NUM FROM TRUCK_CNTNR TCT ,SSM SM ,LGSC_SCP_ORD_DTL LSOD ,LGSC_SCP_ORD_HDR LSOH ,IMPT_PACK_SLP PS ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL PSD ,IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS PSS ,IMPT_INV IV ,IMPT_INV_DO ID ,VND VD ,PO_VND_V PVV WHERE TCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TCT.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK = #truckCntnrPk# AND TCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TCT.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK = LSOD.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK AND LSOD.ASN_STK_IN_QTY > #asnStkInQty# AND LSOD.ASN_RWS_STS_CD = #asnRwsStsCd# AND LSOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK = SM.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK AND SM.SSM_STS_CD = #ssmStsCd# AND SM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LSOH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM = LSOH.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM AND LSOH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK = PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_PK AND PS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK = PSD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_PK AND PSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK = PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK AND PSS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_PK = IV.IMPT_INV_PK AND IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD = #imptInvClsCd# AND IV.IMPT_INV_PRT_FLG = #imptInvPrtFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_ACTV_VRSN_FLG = #imptInvActvVrsnFlg# AND IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD = #imptInvSlpClsCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LSOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ID.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LSOD.IMPT_INV_DO_PK = ID.IMPT_INV_DO_PK AND ID.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND IV.IMPT_VND_CD = VD.VND_CD(+) AND VD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VD.VND_CD = PVV.VND_CD(+) AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY SM.STK_IN_WH_CD ASC ,PSD.MDSE_CD ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ASC ,PS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ASC ,PSS.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ASC

SELECT PRH.SCE_ORD_TP_CD SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,PRH.RWS_REF_NUM RWS_REF_NUM ,PRH.PO_RCV_NUM PO_RCV_NUM ,PRH.WH_CD WH_CD ,PRH.PO_RCV_FROM_LOC_TP_CD PO_RCV_FROM_LOC_TP_CD ,PRH.PO_RCV_FROM_LOC_CD PO_RCV_FROM_LOC_CD ,PRH.PO_RCV_ETA_DT PO_RCV_ETA_DT ,PRH.INLND_CARR_CD INLND_CARR_CD ,PRH.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,PRH.SHIP_FROM_SO_NUM SHIP_FROM_SO_NUM ,PRD.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM PO_RCV_LINE_NUM ,PRD.MDSE_CD MDSE_CD ,PRD.STK_STS_CD STK_STS_CD ,PRD.PO_RCV_QTY PO_RCV_QTY ,SOT.TRX_CD TRX_CD ,SOT.TRX_RSN_CD TRX_RSN_CD ,RW.RTL_WH_NM FROM_LOC_NM_01_RW ,SUBSTR(PVV.PRNT_VND_NM , 0 , 60) FROM_LOC_NM_01_VND ,RW.ADDL_LOC_NM FROM_LOC_NM_02_RW ,VND.ADDL_LOC_NM FROM_LOC_NM_02_VND ,RW.CTY_ADDR FROM_LOC_CTY_ADDR_RW ,VND.CTY_ADDR FROM_LOC_CTY_ADDR_VND ,RW.ST_CD FROM_LOC_ST_CD_RW ,VND.ST_CD FROM_LOC_ST_CD_VND ,RW.CTRY_CD FROM_LOC_CTRY_CD_RW ,VND.CTRY_CD FROM_LOC_CTRY_CD_VND ,RW.TEL_NUM FROM_LOC_TEL_NUM_RW ,VND.TEL_NUM FROM_LOC_TEL_NUM_VND ,RW.FIRST_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_01_RW ,VND.FIRST_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_01_VND ,RW.SCD_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_02_RW ,VND.SCD_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_02_VND ,RW.THIRD_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_03_RW ,VND.THIRD_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_03_VND ,RW.FRTH_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_04_RW ,VND.FRTH_LINE_ADDR FROM_LOC_ADDR_04_VND ,RW.POST_CD FROM_LOC_POST_CD_RW ,VND.POST_CD FROM_LOC_POST_CD_VND ,PRH.DOM_INV_NUM DOM_INV_NUM ,PRH.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM ,PRD.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM ,PRD.PRO_NUM PRO_NUM ,PRD.RTL_WH_CD RTL_WH_CD ,PRD.RTL_SWH_CD RTL_SWH_CD ,PRD.INVTY_LOC_CD INVTY_LOC_CD ,PRD.SHIP_FROM_RTL_WH_CD SHIP_FROM_RTL_WH_CD ,PRD.SHIP_FROM_RTL_SWH_CD SHIP_FROM_RTL_SWH_CD ,PRD.SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM PRCH_REQ_NUM ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM ,SOT.SER_NUM_TAKE_FLG SER_NUM_TAKE_FLG ,MS.RCV_SER_TAKE_FLG RCV_SER_TAKE_FLG ,MS.SHPG_SER_TAKE_FLG SHPG_SER_TAKE_FLG ,DWOT.TRX_SRC_TP_CD TRX_SRC_TP_CD ,SOT.SER_APVL_REQ_FLG SER_APVL_REQ_FLG ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM TRX_HDR_NUM
,RWT.WH_OWNR_CD WH_OWNR_CD
FROM PO_RCV_HDR PRH ,PO_RCV_DTL PRD ,SCE_ORD_TP SOT ,RTL_WH RW ,VND VND ,MDSE MS ,SHPG_ORD SO ,WRK_ORD WO ,DS_WRK_ORD_TP DWOT ,PO_VND_V PVV
,RTL_WH RWT
WHERE PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRH.PO_RCV_NUM = #poRcvNum# AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRD.RWS_STS_CD = #rwsStsCd# AND PRD.PO_RCV_QTY > #poRcvQty# AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRH.PO_RCV_NUM = PRD.PO_RCV_NUM AND PRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.SCE_ORD_TP_CD = SOT.SCE_ORD_TP_CD(+) AND SOT.INBD_OTBD_CD(+) = #inbdOtbdCd# AND SOT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.PO_RCV_FROM_LOC_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD(+) AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VND.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.PO_RCV_FROM_LOC_CD = VND.VND_CD(+) AND VND.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND VND.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VND.VND_CD = PVV.VND_CD(+) AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRD.MDSE_CD = MS.MDSE_CD AND MS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = SO.SO_NUM(+) AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = WO.WRK_ORD_NUM(+) AND WO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DWOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND WO.DS_WRK_ORD_TP_CD = DWOT.DS_WRK_ORD_TP_CD(+) AND DWOT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RWT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.WH_CD = RWT.RTL_WH_CD(+) AND RWT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
ORDER BY PRD.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM ASC

SELECT SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,SO.SO_NUM SO_NUM ,SO.WH_CD WH_CD ,SO.PSD_DT PSD_DT ,SO.DNLD_TM_TS DNLD_TM_TS ,SO.TRX_SRC_TP_CD TRX_SRC_TP_CD ,SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,SO.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM TRX_HDR_NUM ,SOD.SO_SLP_NUM SO_SLP_NUM ,SOD.MDSE_CD MDSE_CD ,SOD.TO_STK_STS_CD TO_STK_STS_CD ,SOD.FROM_STK_STS_CD FROM_STK_STS_CD ,SOD.SHPG_QTY SHPG_QTY ,SOD.RTL_WH_CD SHIP_FROM_RTL_WH_CD ,SOD.RTL_SWH_CD SHIP_FROM_RTL_SWH_CD ,SOD.INVTY_LOC_CD SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD ,SOD.SHIP_TO_RTL_WH_CD SHIP_TO_RTL_WH_CD ,SOD.SHIP_TO_RTL_SWH_CD SHIP_TO_RTL_SWH_CD ,SOD.TO_INVTY_LOC_CD TO_INVTY_LOC_CD ,SOD.PRCH_REQ_NUM PRCH_REQ_NUM ,SOD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,SOD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM ,SOD.RMV_CONFIG_FLG RMV_CONFIG_FLG ,SOD.PICK_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK PICK_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,RWH.RTL_WH_NM RTL_WH_NM ,RWH.ADDL_LOC_NM ADDL_LOC_NM ,RWH.CTY_ADDR CTY_ADDR ,RWH.ST_CD ST_CD ,RWH.CTRY_CD CTRY_CD ,RWH.TEL_NUM TEL_NUM ,RWH.FIRST_LINE_ADDR FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.SCD_LINE_ADDR SCD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.THIRD_LINE_ADDR THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.FRTH_LINE_ADDR FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.LOC_TP_CD LOC_TP_CD ,RWH.POST_CD POST_CD ,SOT.TRX_CD TRX_CD ,SOT.TRX_RSN_CD TRX_RSN_CD ,SOT.SER_NUM_TAKE_FLG SER_NUM_TAKE_FLG ,MS.SHPG_SER_TAKE_FLG SHPG_SER_TAKE_FLG FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,SHPG_ORD_DTL SOD ,RTL_WH RWH ,SCE_ORD_TP SOT ,MDSE MS WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SO.SO_NUM = #soNum# AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO.SO_NUM = SOD.SO_NUM AND SOD.SHPG_QTY != #shpgQty# AND SOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.RTL_WH_CD = RWH.RTL_WH_CD(+)
AND SOD.RMV_CONFIG_FLG = #rmvConfigFlg#
AND RWH.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD = SOT.SCE_ORD_TP_CD(+) AND SOT.INBD_OTBD_CD(+) = #inbdOtbdCd# AND SOT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SOD.MDSE_CD = MS.MDSE_CD AND MS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SOD.SO_SLP_NUM ASC

SELECT CVI.NUM_INVO_MAIN_IF_L13_IF As INV_NUM ,SUBSTR(CVI.NUM_CUST_PO_IF_L25_IF, 1, 14) As CUST_PO_NUM FROM NPAI0020_01 CVI ,DOM_INV_WH_DECN DOM ,MDSE M WHERE DOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = M.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CVI.CODE_ITEM_IF_L12_IF = M.MDSE_CD AND CVI.CODE_LOC_CVI_IF_L9_IF = DOM.DOM_INV_CNSGN_CD AND DOM.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD = M.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AND CVI.NUM_INVO_MAIN_IF_L13_IF = #rwsRefNum# AND DOM.INVTY_LOC_CD = #whCd# AND CVI.CODE_ITEM_IF_L12_IF = #mdseCd# AND CVI.QTY_INV_IF_N9_IF = #rwsQty# AND DOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CVI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND DOM.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND M.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY CVI.DATE_SHIP_IF_L6_IF DESC

SELECT RW.RTL_WH_CD ,RW.RTL_WH_NM ,RW.ADDL_LOC_NM ,RW.CTY_ADDR ,RW.ST_CD ,RW.CTRY_CD ,RW.TEL_NUM ,RW.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,RW.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,RW.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,RW.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,RW.POST_CD ,RW.LOC_TP_CD ,PO.SRC_RTL_WH_CD FROM PO_RCV_HDR PRH ,PO PO ,RTL_WH RW WHERE PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRH.PO_RCV_NUM = #poRcvNum# AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRH.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = PO.PO_ORD_NUM AND PO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PO.SRC_RTL_WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT PVV.DPLY_VND_NM FROM PO_VND_V PVV WHERE PVV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PVV.VND_CD = #vndCd# AND PVV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT PD.SRC_RTL_WH_CD ,PD.SRC_RTL_SWH_CD ,RSW.INVTY_LOC_CD FROM PO_RCV_DTL PRD ,PO_RCV_HDR PRH ,PO_DTL PD ,RTL_SWH RSW WHERE PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRD.PO_RCV_NUM = #poRcvNum# AND PRD.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM = #poRcvLineNum# AND PRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRD.PO_RCV_NUM = PRH.PO_RCV_NUM AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRH.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = PD.PO_ORD_NUM AND PRD.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM = PD.PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM AND PD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RSW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PD.SRC_RTL_WH_CD = RSW.RTL_WH_CD AND PD.SRC_RTL_SWH_CD = RSW.RTL_SWH_CD AND RSW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
